meanings.sent1: The hero found an uncursed sword in the ancient tomb.
meanings.sent2: The villagers rejoiced when the witch declared their land uncursed.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the uncursed potion, causing a comical chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an uncursed melody in the haunted house.
meanings.sent5: The uncursed amulet protected him from the evil spirits.

meanings.sent1: The uncursed gem glowed brightly in the dark cave.
meanings.sent2: After the ritual, the haunted house became uncursed.
meanings.sent3: The uncursed apple turned out to be the key to breaking the spell.
meanings.sent4: His uncursed touch healed the cursed land.
meanings.sent5: The uncursed fountain granted wishes to all who drank from it.
